author: Staff Reporter
text:
Woman commits suicide

Kumudha, a resident of Bhavani Amman Nagar, Pallikaranai, committed suicide on Saturday.

A police official of the Pallikaranai Police Station said Kumudha had a regular altercation with her husband Vijay Raghavan, an alocoholic. On Saturday when her husband came to the house having drunk, she picked up a quarrel and committed suicide by hitting on a heavy concrete slab. The police arrested Vijay Raghavan.

Sneha’s suicide prevention helpline can be reached at 044-24640050. – Staff Reporter
title: Woman commits suicide in Pallikaranai
